Click the 'Login' button
Verify the 'Login' button background color changes to #007bff from #6c757d within 300ms, text color #ffffff, border 1px solid #007bff, horizontal dimension 100px, and vertical dimension 36px
Verify the 'Email' input field has placeholder 'Enter your email address', width 250px, height 40px, and is enabled
Type 'test@example.com' into the 'Email' input field
Verify the 'Email' input field value is 'test@example.com' and text color is #333333
Navigate to 'https://example.com/products/item1'
Verify the product image has source 'product_main.jpg', rendered dimensions 600x400px, natural dimensions 1200x800px, alt text 'High-quality smartphone', loaded within 500ms, and no visible watermark
Verify the fixed header has background color #333333, text color #ffffff, height 60px, and remains visible during vertical scroll
Verify the 'Brand Name' text has font size 24px, font family 'Arial', and font weight 700
Play the video at 'https://example.com/video/intro.mp4'
Verify the video player is 1280px wide, 720px high, and not muted
Click the fullscreen button
Verify the video player enters fullscreen mode within 1s
Verify the navigation menu contains 5 list items
Verify each list item has text size 16px, color #000000, and inner spacing 10px 15px
Hover over the 'About Us' navigation list item
Verify the 'About Us' navigation list item background color changes to #f0f0f0 with a 200ms transition
Click 'Open Dialog'
Verify the modal dialog is visible, centered on screen (x: 50%, y: 50%), has width 500px, height 300px, border 2px solid #cccccc, border radius 8px, and opacity 1
Verify the 'Download Report' button is enabled, has background color #28a745, text color #ffffff, and font size 16px
Click the 'Download Report' button
Verify the 'Download Report' button becomes disabled, its opacity reduces to 0.6, and its label changes to 'Downloading...'
Verify the table 'Recent Orders' displays exactly 10 rows
Verify the 'Order ID' column text is aligned left
Verify the 'Amount' column text is aligned right
Verify the table cells have type size 14px and padding 8px
Scroll down 500px
Verify the 'Back to Top' button appears at x: 90%, y: 90% of the viewport, with 300ms fade-in transition, background color rgba(0,0,0,0.7), and aria-label 'Scroll to top'
Verify the 'settings' icon (source 'settings.svg') has rendered dimensions 24x24px, color #666666, and aria-label 'Application Settings'
Select '2023-10-26' from the date picker
Verify the selected date element has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, value '2023-10-26', and font family 'Helvetica Neue'
Initiate a file upload
Verify the progress bar has width 300px, its value updates from 0% to 100% over 10s, and its background color fills from #e9ecef to #007bff as value increases
Click the 'Reviews' tab
Verify the 'Reviews' tab becomes active with background color #ffffff, bottom border 2px solid #007bff, and text color #007bff
Verify other tabs revert to background #f8f9fa and text color #6c757d
Submit an invalid form
Verify an error message 'Please fill in all required fields' is visible below the form, displayed in font size 14px, color #dc3545, and with 10px top margin
Adjust the volume slider to 75%
Verify the volume slider's current setting is 75, its filled track has background color #28a745, its width is 200px, and the handle is positioned at 75% across the track
Trigger a 'Success!' notification

Verify the toast appears at top-right corner (right: 20px, top: 20px), has background color #28a745, opacity 1, fades out within 5s with an animation, and its content is 'Success! Your changes have been saved.'
Verify the user avatar image (source 'avatar_user.png') is displayed as a circular shape with border radius 50%, rendered dimensions 48x48px, 1px solid #cccccc border, and is loaded
Hover over the 'Help' icon
Verify a tooltip is visible after 300ms, displaying 'Click for assistance', with background color #333333, text color #ffffff, 8px padding, and x and y coordinates relative to the icon's center
Verify the page footer is positioned at the bottom, has background color #f8f9fa, text color #6c757d, and font size 12px
